molecular.statistics.time_series.tcorr¶

molecular.statistics.time_series.tcorr(a, fft=False)[source]¶

Compute correlation time \(\tau_{corr}\) based on the autocorrelation function \(\rho(k)\).

\[\tau_{corr} = \sum_{t=1}^{T} (1 - \frac{t}{T}) \rho_{t}\]

Note: only \(k\) before the first occurrence \(\rho(k) = 0\) are taken. Estimates after this are statistically unreliable.

Parameters

  • a (numpy.ndarray) – 1D array.

  • fft (bool) – Should fast Fourier transform be used?

Returns

Correlation time.

Return type

float

References

Previous topic

molecular.statistics.time_series.sem_tcorr
